main.name: Ian Henderson
main.description: I am a full stack engineer with a specialization in TypeScript, Node.js, and React.
main.bio: I have five years of industry experience creating full stack applications using TypeScript, Node.js, GraphQL, React, React Native, and other tools in the JavaScript ecosystem. I love learning new technologies. I'm currently diving into AWS cloud development. I like to go on hikes and watch old movies in my free time.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed a website and accompanying iPhone app for SAVI's inventory management system. Developed a webapp to control gaming console streaming system that was developed for a client. Stack included React, React Native, TypeScript, GraphQL, Node.js, and MongoDB.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked with a team to deliver a data-heavy webapp to manage IBM bare-metal and virtual servers. Most of my time was spent creating a reusable table component and corresponding GraphQL functionality to handle large, paginated data sets. Stack included JavaScript, GraphQL, and React.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked with team to move code base away from Meteor.js towards microservices. Worked with a team to deliver a task management app for building maintainers. Stack included React, React Native, GraphQL, Node.js, and MongoDB.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked with a team to create a new marketplace UI in React. Maintained legacy PHP backend and SSO services.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Helped build an email notification service with Python SendGrid and a simple messaging UI on Partnered's site.
